name: Mini Iaido
description:
Overview

Oculus quest game made on a single day! I just started the 7/2/21 afternoon and publish it the same day! I will probably keep updating it day by day. 

The idea is to create a Iaido game, the power should come from the unsheathe.
I could make it in one day but thats the point. I hope you like it and support me with kid words anyway :)

Controls

Just click the start the button, grab your sword a start cutting bamboo!

Credits

The Sky of our Ancestors by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4510-the-sky-of-our-ancestors
